message: I see you are licensed to sell D I. Did you know about our new D I series? Ask your D I clients if they are interested in any of our new products.
Do you have a client that has recently had a life event? Life events are great opportunities to revisit fact finder with a client.
Contact clients annually to see if there are changes to their financial needs.
Ask the clients you meet for a referral. Referred leads help start the conversation.
Attend community events. Good networking skills are essential for building your pipeline.
Make a habit of documenting every lead you collect in CRM.  This habit will pay off and help you meet this goal.
Share your favorite restaurant in your next appointment to learn what your clients favorites are and document it in CRM.
Use your birthday activity as an opportunity to schedule a lunch with a client.
Avoid noisy locations when scheduling lunches. This is your opportunity to listen to the clients financial needs.
